name: Put It Out (Dinowolf10, natedog334)
description:
Spontaneous combustion strikes again! You find yourself engulfed in flames and need a way to put it out. Run, jump, and wall bounce through a dangerous factory in search of a much needed pool. Better keep moving!

Created by Nathan Ballay (natedog334) and Zaven Kazandjian (Dinowolf10) for the Innovator's Game Jam 2021.

All assets used were created during the 48 hours of the game jam excluding the background music.

BGM - Retro Rock Theme #4 (Looped) by Andrey Sitkov
